JERK JUNCTION HAVE THE GRILLS OUT IN FRONT OF THEIR CHORLTON RESTAURANT AFTER THEIR RECENT DEVASTATING FIRE 

You may have seen the videos on social media of the horrific fires at @jerkjunction in Chorlton recently that have forced the restaurant to close down for the foreseeable future. 

They arenâ€™t letting this stop them from serving up their famous Caribbean food, as theyâ€™ve got their barbecue drums out for the weekend. Theyâ€™re going to be serving up a limited menu of jerk chicken, wings, burgers and rice and peas from the front of their Manchester Road spot. 

Thereâ€™s also a rum punch station set up outside as well as two slushy machines, with music blasting out of a speaker - perfect for this weather!

Itâ€™s great to see these guys making the best of a bad situation, so while the weather is hot get down and support them. Theyâ€™re doing the barbecue from 12-8pm from today until Sunday.
